application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Ross said he will process this quickly: On rear raised rubber sufaces play areaT1-T4 Holm Oak x4 - Crown reduce to previous points i.e. by 2-3m and crown thin by 20% to mitigate bird feaces on playground and contain. Retain all internal growth to maintain a densely foliated canopy.Front of senior SchoolT5 False Acacia - Crown reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 3m. Final height 14m and spread 7mT6-T7 Common lime x2 - remove truncal and basal suckersT8-T9 Strawberry Tree x2 - Crown lift to provide 3.5m clearance from ground level over road and path only. Final height 10m and spread 8mT10-T12 Lime x3 - Crown lift to provide 3m clearance from ground level i.e. removal of truncal suckers and remove deadwood. Final height 9m and spread 6m each.
